Skip to contents
modernBoot 0.1.0
  • Get Started
  • Reference
  • Vignettes
Implements modern resampling methods (nonparametric, wild, block, stationary), automated method selection, and tools for simulation studies. Includes parallel backends and multiple-testing-aware permutation tests.
